original_text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master, and the servant as his lord. If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub, how much more shall they call them of his household?
korean_text: 제자가 그 선생 같고 종이 그 상전 같으면 족하도다 집 주인을 바알세불이라 하였거든 하물며 그 집 사람들이랴

sentences.original_text: It is enough for the disciple
that he be as his master
and the servant as his lord
If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그들이 집 주인을 바알세불이라 불렀다면

sentences.original_text: how much more shall they call them
